atk-abh03a33:2_0: 802-803. Idāni manussalokakathā nāma hoti. Tattha ‘‘tathāgato loke, jāto loke saṁvaḍḍho,
atk-abh03a33:2_1: lokaṁ abhibhuyya viharati anupalitto lokenā’’ti (saṁ. ni. 3.94) suttaṁ ayoniso gahetvā
atk-abh03a33:2_2: ‘‘bhagavā tusitabhavane nibbatto tattheva vasati, na manussalokaṁ āgacchati, nimmitarūpamattakaṁ
atk-abh03a33:2_3: panettha dassetī’’ti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi vetullakānaṁyeva, te sandhāya
atk-abh03a33:2_4: pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṁ puṭṭhokāsena ceva suttasādhanena ca
atk-abh03a33:2_5: saññāpetuṁ nanu atthītiādimāha. Loke jātoti paravādī tusitapuraṁ sandhāya vadati.
atk-abh03a33:2_6: Satthārā panetaṁ manussalokaññeva sandhāya lokaṁ vuttaṁ. Lokaṁ abhibhuyyāti paravādī
atk-abh03a33:2_7: manussalokaṁ abhibhavitvāti diṭṭhiyā vadati, satthā pana ārammaṇalokaṁ abhibhavitvā
atk-abh03a33:2_8: vihāsi. Anupalitto lokenāti paravādī manussalokena anupalittataṁva sandhāya vadati,
atk-abh03a33:2_9: satthā pana lokadhammesu kilesehi anupalitto vihāsi. Tasmā asādhakametanti.
atk-abh03a33:5_0: 804-806. Idāni dhammadesanākathā nāma hoti. Tattha ‘‘tusitapure ṭhito bhagavā dhammadesanatthāya
atk-abh03a33:5_1: abhinimmitaṁ pesesi, tena ceva tassa ca desanaṁ sampaṭicchitvā āyasmatā ānandena
atk-abh03a33:5_2: dhammo desito, na buddhena bhagavatā’’ti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi vetullakānaññeva;
atk-abh03a33:5_3: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṁ ‘‘yadi tena dhammo desito,
atk-abh03a33:5_4: sveva satthā bhaveyyā’’ti codetuṁ abhinimmito jinotiādimāha. Itaro tathā asampaṭicchanto
atk-abh03a33:8_0: 807-808. Idāni karuṇākathā nāma hoti. Tattha piyāyitānaṁ vatthūnaṁ vipattiyā sarāgānaṁ
atk-abh03a33:8_1: rāgavasena karuṇāpatirūpikaṁ pavattiṁ disvā ‘‘rāgova karuṇā nāma, so ca bhagavato
atk-abh03a33:8_2: natthi, tasmā natthi buddhassa bhagavato karuṇā’’ti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi uttarāpathakānaṁ;
atk-abh03a33:8_3: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṁ ‘‘karuṇā nāmesā nikkilesatāya
atk-abh03a33:8_4: ceva sattārammaṇatāya ca cetovimuttitāya ca ekādasānisaṁsatāya ca mettādīhi samānajātikā,
atk-abh03a33:8_5: tasmā yadi bhagavato karuṇā natthi, mettādayopissa na siyu’’nti codanatthaṁ natthi
atk-abh03a33:8_6: buddhassa bhagavato mettātiādimāha. Ākāruṇikoti pañhe tathārūpaṁ vohāraṁ apassanto
atk-abh03a33:11_0: 809. Idāni gandhajātakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṁ buddhe bhagavati ayoniso pemavasena
atk-abh03a33:11_1: ‘‘bhagavato uccārapassāvo aññe gandhajāte ativiya adhigaṇhāti, natthi tato ca sugandhataraṁ
atk-abh03a33:11_2: gandhajāta’’nti laddhi, seyyathāpi ekaccānaṁ andhakānañceva uttarāpathakānañca; te
atk-abh03a33:11_3: sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sesamettha yathāpāḷimeva niyyātīti.
atk-abh03a33:14_0: 810-811. Idāni ekamaggakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṁ buddhe bhagavati ayoniso pemavaseneva
atk-abh03a33:14_1: ‘‘bhagavā sotāpanno hutvā sakadāgāmī, sakadāgāmī hutvā anāgāmī, anāgāmī hutvā arahattaṁ
atk-abh03a33:14_2: sacchākāsi, ekeneva pana ariyamaggena cattāri phalāni sacchākāsī’’ti laddhi, seyyathāpi
atk-abh03a33:14_3: tesaññeva; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṁ catūhi phalehi
atk-abh03a33:14_4: saddhiṁ uppannānaṁ catunnaṁ phassādīnaṁ ekato samodhānavasena codetuṁ catunnaṁ phassānantiādimāha.
atk-abh03a33:14_6: ca vutte tena sakkāyadiṭṭhiādīnaṁ pahānābhāvavasena codeti. Bhagavā sotāpannoti buddhabhūtassa
atk-abh03a33:14_7: sotāpannabhāvo natthīti paṭikkhipati. Parato pañhadvayepi eseva nayo. Sesamettha
atk-abh03a33:17_0: 813-816. Idāni jhānasaṅkantikathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṁ ‘‘idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu
atk-abh03a33:17_1: vivicceva kāmehi paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati, vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā
atk-abh03a33:17_2: dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ, tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ, catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharatī’’ti (saṁ. ni.
atk-abh03a33:17_3: 5.923-934) imaṁ paṭipāṭidesanaṁ nissāya ‘‘tassa tassa jhānassa upacārappavattiṁ vināva
atk-abh03a33:17_4: jhānā jhānaṁ saṅkamatī’’ti laddhi, seyyathāpi mahisāsakānañceva ekaccānañca andhakānaṁ;
atk-abh03a33:17_5: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṁ ‘‘yadi te dutiyajjhānūpacāraṁ
atk-abh03a33:17_6: appatvā uppaṭipāṭiyā paṭhamajjhānā dutiyajjhānameva saṅkamati, paṭhamato tatiyaṁ,
atk-abh03a33:17_7: dutiyato catutthampi saṅkameyyā’’ti codetuṁ paṭhamā jhānātiādimāha. Yā paṭhamassātiādi
atk-abh03a33:17_8: ‘‘yadi paṭhamato anantaraṁ dutiyaṁ, dutiyādīhi vā tatiyādīni samāpajjati, ekāvajjanena
atk-abh03a33:17_9: samāpajjeyyā’’ti codanatthaṁ vuttaṁ. Kāme ādīnavatoti paṭhamaṁ kāme ādīnavato manasi
atk-abh03a33:17_10: karoto pacchā uppajjati. Jhānakkhaṇe panesa nimittameva manasi karoti. Taññeva paṭhamanti
atk-abh03a33:17_11: ‘‘yadi purimajavanato pacchimajavanaṁ viya anantaraṁ uppajjeyya, ṭhapetvā purimapacchimabhāvaṁ
atk-abh03a33:17_12: lakkhaṇato taññeva taṁ bhaveyyā’’ti codetuṁ pucchati. Iminā upāyena sabbattha attho
atk-abh03a33:17_13: veditabbo. Vivicceva kāmehītiādīhi paṭipāṭiyā jhānānaṁ desitabhāvaṁ dīpeti, na anantaruppattiṁ, tasmā asādhakanti.
atk-abh03a33:20_0: 817-818. Idāni jhānantarikakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṁ samaye ‘‘pañcakanaye pañca
atk-abh03a33:20_1: jhānāni vibhattāni, kevalaṁ tayo samādhī uddiṭṭhā’’ti avitakkavicāramattassa samādhino
atk-abh03a33:20_2: okāsaṁ ajānantānaṁ ‘‘paṭhamassa ca dutiyassa ca jhānassa antare jhānantarikā nāma
atk-abh03a33:20_3: esā’’ti laddhi, seyyathāpi sammitiyānañceva ekaccānañca andhakānaṁ; te sandhāya pucchā
atk-abh03a33:20_4: sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṁ ‘‘jhānampi cetasikā dhammā, phassādayopi,
atk-abh03a33:20_5: tasmā yadi jhānantarikā nāma bhaveyya, phassantarikādīhipi bhavitabba’’nti codanatthaṁ
atk-abh03a33:21_0: Dutiyassa ca jhānassāti ‘‘yadi jhānantarikā nāma bhaveyya, dutiyatatiyādīnipi jhānāneva,
atk-abh03a33:21_1: tesampi antarikāya bhavitabba’’nti codanatthaṁ vuttaṁ. So kevalaṁ laddhiyā abhāvena
atk-abh03a33:21_2: paṭikkhipati ceva paṭijānāti ca. Paṭhamassa cāti puṭṭho laddhivasena paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a33:22: 819.Savitakko savicārotiādi ‘‘tiṇṇampi samādhīnaṁ samādhibhāve samāne avitakko vicāramattova samādhi jhānantariko, na itaroti ko ettha visesahetū’’ti codanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a33:23_0: 820-822.Dvinnaṁ jhānānaṁ paṭuppannānanti paṭhamadutiyāni sandhāya pucchati. Itaro
atk-abh03a33:23_1: ‘‘tesaṁ paccuppannānaṁyeva antare avitakko vicāramatto samādhi jhānantariko nāma
atk-abh03a33:23_2: hotī’’ti laddhiyā paṭijānāti. Paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ niruddhanti puṭṭho tiṇṇaṁ ekakkhaṇe
atk-abh03a33:23_3: pavatti na yuttāti paṭijānāti . Avitakko vicāramatto samādhi paṭhamaṁ jhānanti catukkanayavasena
atk-abh03a33:23_4: pucchati. Sakavādī tasmiṁ naye tassa abhāvā paṭikkhipati. Nanu tayo samādhīti etthāyamadhippāyo
atk-abh03a33:23_5: – yathā tesu tīsu samādhīsu dve samādhī jhānāneva, na jhānantarikā, evaṁ itarenapi
atk-abh03a33:26_0: 823-825. Idāni samāpanno saddaṁ suṇātītikathā nāma hoti. Tattha ‘‘yasmā paṭhamassa
atk-abh03a33:26_1: jhānassa saddo kaṇḍako vutto bhagavatā, yadi ca samāpanno taṁ na suṇeyya, kathaṁ
atk-abh03a33:26_2: kaṇḍako siyā. Tasmā samāpanno saddaṁ, suṇātī’’ti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi pubbaseliyānaṁ;
atk-abh03a33:26_3: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Cakkhunā rūpaṁ passatītiādi ‘‘samāpannassa
atk-abh03a33:26_4: tāva pañcadvārappavattaṁ natthi, tasmiṁ asati yadi so saddaṁ suṇeyya, rūpampi passeyyā’’ti
atk-abh03a33:26_5: codanatthaṁ vuttaṁ. Saddo kaṇḍakoti vikkhepakarattā vuttaṁ. Oḷārikena hi saddena
atk-abh03a33:26_6: sote ghaṭṭite paṭhamajjhānato vuṭṭhānaṁ hoti, tenetaṁ vuttaṁ, tasmā asādhakaṁ. Dutiyassa
atk-abh03a33:26_7: jhānassātiādi ‘‘yathā aññopi kaṇḍako antosamāpattiyaṁ natthi, evaṁ saddassavanampī’’ti
atk-abh03a33:29_0: 826-827. Idāni cakkhunā rūpaṁ passatītikathā nāma hoti. Tattha ‘‘cakkhunā rūpaṁ disvā’’ti
atk-abh03a33:29_1: vacanaṁ nissāya ‘‘pasādacakkhumeva rūpaṁ passatī’’ti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi mahāsaṅghikānaṁ
atk-abh03a33:29_2: , te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṁ ‘‘yadi cakkhunā rūpaṁ
atk-abh03a33:29_3: passeyya, rūpena rūpaṁ passeyyātī’’ti codetuṁ rūpena rūpaṁ passatīti āha. Itaro rūpāyatanaṁ
atk-abh03a33:29_4: sandhāya paṭikkhipitvā puna puṭṭho cakkhumeva sandhāya paṭijānāti. Paṭivijānātīti
atk-abh03a33:29_5: ettha ayamadhippāyo – passatīti hi mayaṁ paṭijānanaṁ sandhāya pucchāma, na cakkhūpasaṁhāramattaṁ.
atk-abh03a33:29_6: Tasmā vadehi tāva ‘‘kiṁ te cakkhumā rūpena rūpaṁ paṭivijānātī’’ti. Itaro purimanayeneva
atk-abh03a33:29_7: paṭikkhipati ceva paṭijānāti ca. Atha naṁ ‘‘evaṁ sante rūpaṁ manoviññāṇaṁ āpajjati,
atk-abh03a33:29_8: tañhi paṭivijānāti nāmā’’ti codetuṁ rūpaṁ manoviññāṇanti āha. Itaro lesaṁ alabhanto
atk-abh03a33:29_9: paṭikkhipateva. Atthi cakkhussa āvaṭṭanātiādi ‘‘yadi cakkhu paṭivijānanaṭṭhena passati,
atk-abh03a33:29_10: cakkhuviññāṇassa viya tassāpi āvajjanāya bhavitabba’’nti codetuṁ pucchati. Itaro
atk-abh03a33:29_11: yasmā na āvajjanapaṭibaddhaṁ cakkhu, na taṁ āvajjanānantaraṁ uppajjati, tasmā na
atk-abh03a33:29_12: hevanti paṭikkhipati. Sotena saddantiādīsupi eseva nayo. Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu
atk-abh03a33:29_13: cakkhunā rūpaṁ passatīti sasambhārakathānayena vuttaṁ. Yathā hi usunā vijjhantopi
atk-abh03a33:29_14: ‘‘dhanunā vijjhatī’’ti vuccati, evaṁ cakkhuviññāṇena passantopi ‘‘cakkhunā passatī’’ti
atk-abh03a33:29_15: vutto, tasmā asādhakametaṁ. Sesesupi eseva nayopi.
